DOC.brief_summary: To measure lanthanum concentrations in bone in patients with hyperphosphatemia receiving dialysis
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Treatment on BAY77-1931 (Lanthanum Carbonate) to Measure Lanthanum Concentrations in Bone
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing dialysis or plan to start dialysis before the initial administration of the study medication Patients with severe hypocalcemia (adjusted serum calcium level of <7.5 mg/dL)
